languages.text: "Да-а, и потому продала нас своему собрату, как только выпала такая возможность".
"Of course. This is why she sold us out to her kinsman at the drop of a hat."
languages.original_text: "Да-а, и потому продала нас своему собрату, как только выпала такая возможность".

traits.locale_text: "Of course. This is why she sold us out to her kinsman the first chance she got."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Of course. This is why she sold us out to her kinsman the first chance she got."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Of course. This is why she sold us out to her kinsman at the drop of a hat."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Of course. This is why she sold us out to her kinsman at the drop of a hat."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Of course. This is why she sold us out to her kinsman at the drop of a hat."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Of course. This is why she sold us out to her kinsman at the drop of a hat."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「そうだ。だから彼女は、いとも簡単に我々を彼女のキンに売り渡したのだ」
languages.original_text: "Of course. This is why she sold us out to her kinsman at the drop of a hat."

traits.locale_text: 「そうだ。だから彼女は、いとも簡単に我々を彼女のキンに売り渡したのだ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “当然了。所以她才会想都不想，就把我们出卖给了她的亲族。”
languages.original_text: "Of course. This is why she sold us out to her kinsman at the drop of a hat."

traits.locale_text: “当然了。所以她才会想都不想，就把我们出卖给了她的亲族。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Por supuesto. Por eso nos vendió a los suyos a la primera de cambio».
languages.original_text: "Of course. This is why she sold us out to her kinsman at the drop of a hat."

traits.locale_text: «Por supuesto. Por eso nos vendió a los suyos a la primera de cambio».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Natürlich. Darum hat sie uns ohne zu zögern an ihren Verwandten verkauft."
languages.original_text: "Of course. This is why she sold us out to her kinsman at the drop of a hat."

traits.locale_text: "Natürlich. Darum hat sie uns ohne zu zögern an ihren Verwandten verkauft."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Bien sûr. C'est sans doute pour cette même raison qu'elle nous a vendus sans hésiter à son congénère. »
languages.original_text: "Of course. This is why she sold us out to her kinsman at the drop of a hat."

traits.locale_text: « Bien sûr. C'est sans doute pour cette même raison qu'elle nous a vendus sans hésiter à son congénère. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Elbette. Yoksa niye şıp diye bizi soydaşlarına satsın?"
languages.original_text: "Of course. This is why she sold us out to her kinsman at the drop of a hat."

traits.locale_text: "Elbette. Yoksa niye şıp diye bizi soydaşlarına satsın?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
